sources.title: Post War Inventions (1945)
sources.description: Gandy Goose is reading a book about Post-War Inventions. Sourpuss doesn't like it one bit, and that night he dreams that he has come to a hall of new inventions. At first he's impressed, but things begin to go wrong with the inventions, and when he finally wakes up, he promptly smashes the book over Goose's head. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/post-war-inventions-1945/

metadata.Plot: Gandy Goose is reading a book about Post-War Inventions. Sourpuss doesn't like it one bit, and that night he dreams that he has come to a hall of new inventions. At first he's impressed, but things begin to go wrong with the inventions, and when he finally wakes up, he promptly smashes the book over Goose's head.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
